titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

action.text: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Stabenow. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

bill.summary: 2/17/2011--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry for the 112th Congress.
